channel.title: Talks By Robert K. Dellenbach
channel.description: General Conference talks by Robert K. Dellenbach.

item.title: Hour of Conversion
item.description: May I tell you of the hour of my true conversion to the Lord Jesus Christ and his restored gospel. Perhaps my experience will strengthen those who desire a closer relationship with our Father in Heaven and a more profound testimony of the truthfulnes

item.title: The Translation Miracle of the Book of Mormon
item.description: My dear brothers and sisters, do we realize the profound miracle that is the translation of the Book of Mormon? A miracle is “an extraordinary event manifesting divine intervention in human affairs” ( s.v. “miracle”). Consistent with that definition,

item.title: Sacrifice Brings Forth the Blessings of Heaven
item.description: If we are caring, if we are charitable, if we are obedient to God and follow His prophets, our sacrifices will bring forth the blessings of heaven.
